data.title: Who Is Jasper Breckenridge Johnson, Don Johnson’s Son?
data.meta_description: Jasper Breckenridge Johnson, son of actor Don Johnson, is an American celebrity known for keeping a low profile despite...
data.text:
Jasper Breckenridge Johnson, son of actor Don Johnson, is an American celebrity known for keeping a low profile despite his famous family. Born on June 6, 2002, in Los Angeles, California, Jasper, now 21, prefers to stay out of the Hollywood spotlight.

The Johnson family has a long history in Hollywood. Don Johnson made his acting debut in the late 1960s and is famous for roles in “Miami Vice,” “Nash Bridges,” and “Knives Out.” Jasper’s half-siblings, Jesse and Dakota Johnson, have also built successful acting careers, with Dakota gaining fame for her role in the “Fifty Shades of Grey” series and other notable films like “The Lost Daughter” and “Black Mass.”

Unlike his family, Jasper is passionate about basketball and plays as a point guard. He enjoys the benefits of his family’s wealth and status but focuses on his athletic pursuits and personal interests, maintaining a private and grounded lifestyle away from the public eye.

Who Is Jasper Breckenridge Johnson?

Jasper Breckenridge Johnson is best known as the son of the famous actor and musician Don Johnson. Growing up in the glamorous world of Hollywood, Jasper has experienced a life that many can only dream of. Despite being surrounded by the entertainment industry’s glitz and glamour, Jasper has managed to stay grounded and has cultivated his aspirations and interests, distinct from his family’s legacy.

Jasper Breckenridge Johnson Biography

Jasper Breckenridge Johnson was born on June 6, 2002, in the vibrant city of Los Angeles, California. As of 2023, Jasper is approaching his 21st birthday, which he continues to celebrate each June with his family and close friends. He is the son of the distinguished actors Don Johnson and Kelly Phleger. Jasper’s family includes three half-siblings—Jesse Johnson, Grace Johnson, and Dakota Johnson—and two additional siblings from his parents’ previous relationships, Atherton Gracie and Deacon.

Despite growing up in a privileged and affluent household, Jasper has always been passionate about basketball. This balanced upbringing has helped shape Jasper into a promising young adult, grounded in his values and dedicated to his interests.

Jasper Breckenridge Johnson Of Profile Summary

Jasper Breckenridge Johnson’s Age

Born on June 6, 2002, in the lively city of Los Angeles, California, Jasper Breckenridge Johnson will mark his 21st birthday in 2023. As a Gemini, he exemplifies the qualities of versatility and curiosity, traits that have undoubtedly shaped his dynamic personality and diverse interests.

Where Is Jasper’s Originality?

Jasper Breckenridge Johnson is an American, born and raised in Los Angeles, California. He comes from a family with strong ties to the entertainment industry, where his father, Don Johnson, has had a significant impact as a well-known actor and musician.

Jasper Breckenridge Johnson’s Height

Although his exact height is not publicly known, Jasper Breckenridge Johnson is noted to be several inches taller than his father, the renowned actor Don Johnson, who stands at 5 feet 9 inches (1.75 meters). Jasper, with his light brown hair and piercing brown eyes, possesses an athletic charm that complements his passion for basketball.

Jasper Breckenridge Johnson’s Early Life

Jasper Breckenridge Johnson was born on June 6, 2002, in Los Angeles, California, USA, as the fourth child of actor Don Johnson and Kelley Phleger. Despite his deep-rooted Hollywood heritage, Jasper has chosen a path away from the glitz and glamour of the entertainment industry. Growing up with the backdrop of his father’s iconic roles in TV series such as “Miami Vice” and “Nash Bridges,” Jasper discovered his true passion in sports, particularly basketball.

His journey in basketball began with the West Coast Elite Under Armour team, where he showcased his talent and dedication. He later excelled as a point guard at Santa Barbara High School, proving his skills on the court. Despite the allure of fame and wealth surrounding him, Jasper has remained committed to his passion for sports, forging his distinct path. Today, he stands as a promising young individual, dedicated to his athletic pursuits and maintaining a humble presence, true to his values and individuality in the world of celebrities.

Jasper Breckenridge Johnson’s Education

During his time at Santa Barbara High School, Jasper Breckenridge Johnson not only demonstrated excellence in his studies but also showcased remarkable skills on the basketball court, earning himself a spot on the team. While details about his collegiate education institution remain undisclosed, Jasper’s unwavering dedication to sports has undoubtedly influenced his higher education choices.

Despite being born into a family synonymous with Hollywood fame, Jasper’s prioritization of sports and education highlights his steadfast commitment to pursuing his genuine passion. This emphasis on both athletics and academics underscores Jasper’s dedication to personal growth and development, as he continues to carve out his path separate from his family’s entertainment legacy.

Jasper Breckenridge Johnson’s Parents

Jasper Breckenridge Johnson’s parents are the renowned actor Don Johnson and his wife, Kelley Phleger. Despite being part of a family deeply rooted in the entertainment industry, Jasper’s parents have consistently supported his passion for sports. They have actively encouraged him to pursue his interests outside the realm of Hollywood’s glitz and glamour. Despite his prestigious lineage, Jasper has managed to maintain a low profile, focusing on carving out his path in the world of sports.

Jasper’s Father – Don Johnson

Don Johnson, an esteemed American actor, producer, and singer, has enjoyed a remarkable career spanning over five decades. Born on December 15, 1949, in Flat Creek, Missouri, USA, Johnson has made significant contributions to the entertainment industry.

Johnson’s cinematic repertoire includes memorable performances in films such as “A Boy and His Dog” (1975), “Django Unchained” (2012), and “Knives Out” (2019), showcasing his versatility as an actor. With an active presence on Instagram, boasting over 263K followers, Johnson remains connected with his fans and peers, engaging in meaningful interactions.

Interestingly, Johnson’s son, Jasper Breckenridge Johnson, has chosen a different path from the family’s Hollywood legacy. Instead of pursuing a career in acting, Jasper has opted to pursue a successful journey in athletics, showcasing his individuality and carving out his own unique identity separate from his father’s illustrious career.

Jasper’s Mother – Kelley Phleger

Kelley Phleger, the wife of the renowned American actor, producer, and singer Don Johnson, tied the knot with him on April 29, 1999, creating a family together. Their union has brought them three children—a daughter named Atherton Grace and two sons, Jasper Breckenridge and Deacon. Phleger herself is deeply committed to the field of education, working as a kindergarten and school teacher. While she is dedicated to her professional endeavors, she also actively participates in various social circles. As a result, her financial status remains undisclosed, adding an aura of mystery to her background.

Jasper’s 2 Siblings

Jasper Breckenridge Johnson shares a close bond with his siblings, Deacon Johnson and Grace Johnson, forming a tight-knit unit within their renowned family. Despite the constant spotlight on their family because of their father’s celebrity status, Jasper and his siblings maintain a strong and enduring connection that goes beyond their famous background.

Deacon Johnson

Deacon Johnson, the younger sibling of Jasper Breckenridge Johnson, shares the same parents, Don Johnson and Kelley Phleger. Although specific details about Deacon’s age and personal life are undisclosed, like his siblings, he enjoys the privileges associated with being part of the Johnson-Phleger family. Within their family circle, Deacon holds a significant role and receives abundant love and support from his renowned parents.

Grace Johnson

Grace Johnson, born on December 28, 1999, to actor Don Johnson and Kelley Phleger, has emerged as a prominent American model. With waist and hip measurements of 24″ and 31″, respectively, she epitomizes the sought-after proportions in the modeling industry. Grace’s profile on Model Mayhem features 20 captivating images and boasts 138 friends, indicating her popularity and influence within the industry. Additionally, the Fashion Model Directory website showcases 56 striking photos of Grace, further emphasizing her captivating presence and success as a model.

Jasper Breckenridge Johnson’s Half Siblings

Jasper Breckenridge Johnson has two half-siblings from his father’s previous relationships. Dakota Johnson is his half-sister, born to Don Johnson and actress Melanie Griffith. Meanwhile, Jesse Johnson is his half-brother from another relationship of Don Johnson’s. Despite having different mothers, they share a familial bond through their common parent, Don Johnson.

Dakota Johnson

Dakota Johnson, a celebrated American actress and fashion model, was born on October 4, 1989, in Austin, Texas. She is the daughter of renowned actors Don Johnson and Melanie Griffith. Dakota began her career at a young age, making her film debut at ten in the dark comedy “Crazy in Alabama” (1999), where she shared the screen with her mother. Her portrayal of Anastasia Steele in the “Fifty Shades” film series (2015-2018) catapulted her to fame.

Beyond her role in the “Fifty Shades” franchise, Dakota has starred in various other films, including “Black Mass” (2015), “A Bigger Splash” (2015), and “How to Be Single” (2016). Her talent has garnered her nominations for prestigious awards such as the BAFTA Rising Star Award, demonstrating her widespread recognition in the industry. Dakota also maintains a significant presence on social media, boasting over 5 million followers on Instagram.

Jesse Johnson

Jesse Johnson, an accomplished American actor, was born on December 7, 1982, in Los Angeles, California. He is the son of esteemed actors Don Johnson and Patti D’Arbanville. Jesse began his acting journey with a guest appearance on the CBS television series “Nash Bridges” in 2001. Driven by his passion for theater, he pursued a theater major at Occidental College in Los Angeles, graduating in 2004.

Throughout his career, Jesse has participated in a diverse range of film and television projects, showcasing his versatility as an actor. His credits include roles in the independent film “Circle of Eight” and the iconic TV series “Twin Peaks.”

Jasper’s Personal Life And Relationships

Despite coming from a prominent Hollywood family, Jasper Breckenridge Johnson prioritizes privacy over the allure of the limelight. He consciously avoids public attention, maintaining a low-key presence on social media platforms. While Jasper’s personal life remains shrouded in mystery, he shares a deep connection with his father, Don Johnson, and his siblings. Despite the temptation to revel in celebrity status, Jasper remains steadfast in his dedication to his true passion: sports, particularly basketball. This unwavering focus highlights his commitment to personal fulfillment and his determination to forge his path, distinct from the glitz and glamour of his family’s legacy.

Jasper Breckenridge Johnson’s Career

In contrast to many in his family lineage who pursued acting careers, Jasper carved his path as an athlete. Despite lacking a family background in basketball or sports in general, Jasper displayed a natural affinity for the game from a young age. Encouraged by his parents’ unwavering support and top-notch training, Jasper honed his skills and excelled on the basketball court.

During his time at Santa Barbara High, Jasper established himself as a skilled player, notably as a point guard. His dedication and hard work led to recognition as a valued member of the school’s basketball team. While the specifics of his current career path remain undisclosed, Jasper’s enduring passion for basketball suggests a potential continuation of his involvement in the sport.

His Passion For Sports

From a young age, Jasper Breckenridge Johnson immersed himself in sports, particularly basketball, despite being born into a family synonymous with Hollywood royalty. His innate talent and unwavering dedication to the game set him apart from his famous relatives.

Jasper’s commitment to basketball was evident when he joined the esteemed West Coast Elite Under Armour basketball team, where he refined his skills and demonstrated his unwavering determination. As he matured, Jasper earned a pivotal role as a point guard for Santa Barbara High School’s basketball team. While his father, Don Johnson, commanded screens worldwide, Jasper discovered his passion on the basketball court. Blessed with remarkable height and exceptional abilities, Jasper remains dedicated to achieving excellence in basketball.

Why Jasper Keeps A Low Profile?

Despite being from a lineage steeped in Hollywood glamour, Jasper Breckenridge Johnson chooses a reserved presence. Unlike his famous relatives, he avoids social media, preferring privacy. This choice allows Jasper to fully focus on his true passion: sports, especially basketball, without the distractions of celebrity status. His deliberate decision reflects a desire for a simple, independent life, diverging from the typical Hollywood lifestyle. Staying true to his beliefs, Jasper charts his own course, embodying contentment beyond the allure of fame and glamor.

Future Plans For Jasper Breckenridge -Johnson

Jasper’s future is shrouded in uncertainty, given his love for basketball and preference for a private lifestyle, leaving multiple possibilities open. However, what is clear is Jasper’s determination to forge his way, guided by his personal beliefs and ambitions. Throughout this journey, the unwavering support of his family acts as a solid foundation, empowering him to navigate the uncertainties of life.

Net Worth And Financial Stability

Jasper Breckenridge Johnson’s financial stability stems from his family’s success in the entertainment industry. As the son of Don Johnson, whose net worth is estimated at $50 million, Jasper is in a comfortable financial position. Although he may not have started a formal career yet, his family’s wealth provides him with ample resources. This financial security gives him the freedom to pursue his passion for basketball wholeheartedly without the immediate burden of financial constraints.

Interesting Facts About Jasper Breckenridge Johnson

Passionate Athlete: Jasper Breckenridge Johnson’s love for sports, especially basketball, shines through despite being born into the Hollywood scene.

Embracing Privacy: Unlike many celebrity offspring, Jasper chooses a modest lifestyle, steering clear of the spotlight associated with his family’s fame.

Academic Excellence: Alongside his athletic achievements, Jasper excels academically, demonstrating a well-rounded approach to his education during his time at Santa Barbara High School.

Strong Family Bonds: Within the Johnson household, family ties are paramount, fostering a close-knit relationship among Jasper, his father, Don Johnson, and his siblings, all while prioritizing privacy.

Defining Independence: Jasper carves his path distinct from his family’s acting legacy, opting for sports over an entertainment career, showcasing his autonomy and determination.

Financial Stability: Thanks to his father’s successful Hollywood career, Jasper enjoys financial security and access to ample resources.

FAQs About Jasper Breckenridge Johson

Q: Who is Jasper Breckenridge Johnson?

Jasper Breckenridge Johnson is the son of actor Don Johnson and Kelley Phleger. He is recognized for his enthusiasm for basketball and his inclination towards maintaining a low profile in comparison to his more prominent family members.

Q: When was Jasper Breckenridge Johnson born?

Jasper was born on June 6, 2002, in Los Angeles, California.

Q: How old is Jasper Breckenridge Johnson?

As of 2023, Jasper is 21 years old.

Q: What is Jasper Breckenridge Johnson known for?

Jasper is acknowledged as the son of actor Don Johnson and for his basketball skills, notably playing as a point guard.

Q: Does Jasper Breckenridge Johnson have any siblings?

Yes, Jasper has two full siblings, Grace and Deacon Johnson, along with two half-siblings, Jesse Johnson and Dakota Johnson, from his father’s prior relationships.

Q: What is Jasper Breckenridge Johnson’s height?

While his precise height is undisclosed, it is mentioned that he is taller than his father, Don Johnson, who stands at 5 feet 9 inches (1.75 meters).

Q: What sports does Jasper Breckenridge Johnson play?

Jasper is passionate about basketball and has notably played as a point guard for Santa Barbara High School.

Q: Who are Jasper Breckenridge Johnson’s parents?

His parents are Don Johnson, a renowned actor, and Kelley Phleger, a former schoolteacher.

Q: Why does Jasper Breckenridge Johnson keep a low profile?

Jasper chooses to lead a private life away from the Hollywood limelight to concentrate on his basketball passion and to maintain a sense of normalcy.

Q: What is Jasper Breckenridge Johnson’s net worth?

Jasper’s financial security is bolstered by his family’s wealth, particularly that of his father, Don Johnson, whose estimated net worth is $50 million.

Conclusion

Jasper Breckenridge Johnson stands apart not just for his renowned lineage but for his divergent path away from the glitz and glamour of Hollywood. Born into a household of celebrities, Jasper has opted to pursue his passion for basketball, forging a unique identity distinct from his family’s acting heritage. Despite the luxuries and opportunities inherent in his family’s success, Jasper maintains a grounded and private lifestyle, prioritizing his interests and aspirations. As he progresses in his career, Jasper serves as a model of individuality and commitment, charting his trajectory in life while benefiting from the support and stability provided by his family’s accomplishments.
